channel.title: OleanPkz - ONLINE NOW - MANAGEMENT/DEVO TEAM NEEDED!
channel.description:
[center]
[size=15pt]Yes we are posted.. but we are not well advertised yet..
This server will be up for about 2 weeks before we are fully advertised [/size] (Ad Credits on Google, MoparScape, Rune-Server, BING, RsTop100)
These two weeks before we are posted properly, we will be looking for members to add to our Management, as well as, Development Team.
If you would like to be server and forum sided staff, please click the link below:
If you would like to help program, please click the link below: *All members of the DEVO team are automatically made Admins server-side.
We have been around since 2009! We have shut down for about two years now perfecting our server and forum and we are almost ready to be back up full time! (24/7 AND SPONSORSHIP on every major site)
We are in need of all new SERVER and FORUM staff. From Assistant's to Co-Owners. (Assist, Mod, Admin, Head Admin, Co Owner)
We are also in need of staff to add to our DEVO Team. This team specializes in the coding, and structure of our Web side, as well as our server and client side. (Such as HTML, Client BUGS, GFX and ANIM personel. [/center]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][size=20pt]OleanPkz RSPS and Community forum![/size]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img] [url=http://]Terms and Agreements[/url] - [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vzbfr6.png[/img] [url=http://]Site[/url] - [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://]Forum[/url] - [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://]Webclient[/url] - [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15npw1v.gif[/img] [url=http://]Download Client[/url] [/center]
[center] [b]Introduction:[/b] OleanPkz © 2009-2013 Owned and created by Jason
Welcome to private server: OleanPkz. We are a 317 DELTA (Yes DELTA, not PI.) player-killing, and skilling server. We specialize in PKing with our custom built player killing system. (View the custom PK system [url=http://google.org/forum/index.php?topic=13.0]here[/url].) We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames! You can suggest anything you'd like to see on the forum, or the server by typing ::suggest (In-server.) or by posting your suggestion in the suggestion thread [url=http://google.org/forum/index.php?board=11.0]here[/url]. Suggestions are [u]always[/u] welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team. We offer an auto-donation system, as well as a Vote4Point system. (You can view the donation section here, or the Vote4Points system here.) [/center]
[center][size=18pt]Pictures/Media:[/size] [size=11pt]From the beginning...[/size] [/center]
When you log in for the first time: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/13yktva.png[/img]
Accepting the rules: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/awcad5.png[/img] How to start: (You can type ::skip to skip tutorial island!) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/qo7f2f.png[/img]
[u]If you finish tutorial island[/u], you get to choose a starter package: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vxk21v.png[/img]
Main welcome screen: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28ip6qv.png[/img]
Teleport List: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24edu0j.png[/img]
Donator Panel: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2vcz6gi.png[/img]
Super Donator Panel: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11tml40.png[/img]
[center] -------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=14pt]Online Point Shop Feature[/size][/center]
Online Point Shop: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29fn1k.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click, "Don't show this message again.": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vansbs.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "view shop": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24mg8d0.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Account Offers": [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/oshjea.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Abyssal Whip Exchange": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2crxcg8.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Runes, Arrows, and Food": [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/smenb4.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Weapons and Armour": IMG coming soon!
Online Point Shop - If you click "Rare/Special Items": IMG coming soon!
[center] -------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=14pt]PK Point Shop Feature[/size][/center]
PK Point Shop: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2chawr7.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Killstreak Info.": [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1672uo.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Next Page.": [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2s937go.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Don't display this message again.": [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/311n9tu.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "View Shop": [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mw8ef4.png[/img]
[center] ------------------------------------------------------------------- [/center]
Trial of Judgement Minigame [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24gopll.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23uyal4.png[/img]
All Godwars Bosses [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w7lbit.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m2yr01.png[/img]
Assigned Tasks (With rewards!) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2n9g5zt.png[/img]
More to come..

item.title: OleanPkz - ONLINE NOW - MANAGEMENT/DEVO TEAM NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:37, topic:480844”]addHoverButton(32002, Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, “Accept”, -1, 32003, 1);
You need to start this ’ " ’ no?
addHoverButton(32002, "Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, “Accept”, -1, 32003, 1);[/quote]
good catch, but i think that the whole coding is fked up. This is what i added:

public static void Rules (TextDrawingArea[] tda) { RSInterface rsi = addScreenInterface (32000); addSprite(32001, 1, "Interfaces/Rules/BACKGROUND"); addHoverButton(32002, "Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, "Accept", -1, 32003, 1); addHoveredButton(32003, "Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 1, 106, 43, 32004); addText(32005, "1. You Are No Part Of Jagex!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32006, "2. No Spamming/Scamming!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32007, "3. Listen To Staff Members!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32008, "4. No StaffHunting!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32009, "5. No Bug Abusing!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32010, "6. No Advertising Of Any Kind!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32011, "7. Don't Abuse ::Yell!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32012, "8. No Duping, Report To Staff!",tda, 1, 11702370, true, false); addText(32013, "Failure To Following Rules May Result Into Ban/IpBan!",tda, 1, 16711680, true, false); addText(32014, "These Are Just The Main Rules For Apocraphy!",tda, 1, 16711680, true, false); setChildren(13, Interface); // Sprited, X, Y, ChildId setBounds(32001, 50, 50, 0, Interface); setBounds(32002, 200, 226, 1, Interface); setBounds(32005, 160, 110, 2, Interface); setBounds(32006, 350, 110, 3, Interface); setBounds(32007, 160, 140, 4, Interface); setBounds(32008, 350, 140, 5, Interface); setBounds(32009, 160, 170, 6, Interface); setBounds(32010, 350, 170, 7, Interface); setBounds(32011, 160, 200, 8, Interface); setBounds(32012, 350, 200, 9, Interface); setBounds(32013, 250, 270, 10, Interface); setBounds(32014, 250, 85, 11, Interface); setBounds(32003, 200, 226, 12, Interface); }
This is how my codes look:

public static void clientSettings(TextDrawingArea[] tda) { RSInterface rsi = addTabInterface(31002); addButton(31003, 1, "/Options/OTHER", "Close"); addText(31004, "Client Settings", tda, 1, 0xff9933, true); addButton(31005, 2, "/Options/OTHER", "Toggle x10 Hits"); addText(31006, "x10 Hits [@red@Off@whi@]", tda, 1, 0xffffff, true); addButton(31007, 2, "/Options/OTHER", "Toggle HP bar"); addText(31008, "New HP bar [@red@Off@whi@]", tda, 1, 0xffffff, true); addButton(31009, 2, "/Options/OTHER", "Toggle Hitmarks"); addText(31010, "New hitmarks [@red@Off@whi@]", tda, 1, 0xffffff, true); rsi.totalChildren(8); rsi.child(0, 31003, 164, 7); rsi.child(1, 31004, 95, 10); rsi.child(2, 31005, 40, 35); rsi.child(3, 31006, 95, 38); rsi.child(4, 31007, 40, 65); rsi.child(5, 31008, 95, 68); rsi.child(6, 31009, 40, 95); rsi.child(7, 31010, 95, 98); }
Can someone please help meh :l

Read full topic

Can you help me fix these:
RSInterface.java:479: error: ‘)’ expected
addHoverButton(32002, Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, “Accept”, -1
, 32003, 1);
^
RSInterface.java:479: error: unclosed string literal
addHoverButton(32002, Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, “Accept”, -1
, 32003, 1);
^
RSInterface.java:479: error: not a statement
addHoverButton(32002, Interfaces/Rules/BUTTON", 0, 106, 43, “Accept”, -1
, 32003, 1);
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: OleanPkz - ONLINE NOW - MANAGEMENT/DEVO TEAM NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

arham 4:

You based this on my good friend (youridodock)'s server and modified it to the extent where it’s unoticable. Nice! Gl.

Haha yes, this is correct. It is still noticeable if you know everything that has been changed lol. I’ve added many custom features including 4 un-released mingames. They will be out when we launch the server fully in about a week and a half.

I have given credit to all who has had an impact on our server in our ::credit feature, including your “good friend” youridodock.

Thanks for the feedback.

Read full topic
